info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 3:34AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions with significant blowing and drifting of snow. Snow drifts will be several feet high. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in the lower elevations, and 8 to 12 inches on Casper Mountain. Northeast winds between 15 and 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph will occur today. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impossible in rural areas, and difficult in Casper. Stay home if possible, especially this morning. Prolonged road closures are expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...White-out conditions will occur in rural areas. Flight delays and possible cancellations could occur.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
